meanings.definition: A document outlining the details of a proposed project or business venture.
meanings.sent1: The prospectuses for the new company explained all the plans clearly.
meanings.sent2: I need to review the prospectuses before deciding to invest.
meanings.sent3: The prospectuses were so detailed, they made me feel like a business expert!
meanings.sent4: Her prospectuses were like treasure maps leading to success.
meanings.sent5: The colorful prospectuses caught my eye and made me curious about the project.

meanings.sent1: She collected various prospectuses from different companies.
meanings.sent2: The prospectuses were neatly organized on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: Finding all the prospectuses felt like a fun scavenger hunt.
meanings.sent4: The prospectuses piled up on the desk like a tower of information.
meanings.sent5: The prospectuses fluttered in the wind, creating a paper symphony.
